content.webTitle: Diving: Tom Daley takes silver at world juniors

fields.headline: Daley takes silver at world juniors
fields.bodyText: Tom Daley, competing in his first world junior championship, came second in the 10-metre platform event yesterday in Aachen, Germany. Despite being the reigning European senior champion and having competed at the Beijing Olympics, Daley, 14, had previously been too young to enter a junior championships. Daley, who will compete in the three-metre category today, qualified in first place for the 10-metre event, just one point ahead of China's Xiu Bo, and kept his lead through three rounds before dropping points on his final dive. Britain's James Milton, a potential partner for Daley in the synchro, was fourth, while China's Wu Dongliang took bronze.
